summary: Federal agencies use various financial systems and services to manage substantial amounts of funding. Consolidating these systems and services can help reduce duplicative efforts and costs government-wide. In this Q&A we reviewed federal efforts to implement financial management shared services. These include transaction processing, report preparation, and other financial services and systems. Agencies can get these from a shared marketplace, but there have been challenges...
title: Financial Management Shared Services: Progress and Identified Challenges
